articles.title: WHO list Moderna vaccine for emergency use - Sky News Australia
articles.description:
The World Health Organisation has listed Moderna's coronavirus vaccine for emergency use.

It joins a growing list of jabs approved by the body including AstraZeneca, Pfizer and Johnson & Johnson.

It has taken months for the approval process to occur due to …
